theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on accumulation of mtDNA mutations causing tissue-specific aging and cardiovascular dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes oxidative damage accumulation in mtDNA and defective repair accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights replication errors causing mtDNA mutations as primary driver of mitochondrial dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes rare lethal mtDNA mutations induce apoptosis leading to aging via cell loss.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mtDNA mutation accumulation causing respiratory chain deficiency and age-related osteoporosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic mitochondrial free radical theory linking ROS-induced mtDNA damage to aging vicious cycle.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details ROS production causing mtDNA mutations and vicious cycle accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS-induced mtDNA mutations causing respiratory dysfunction and feedback ROS amplification.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS causing mtDNA oxidative damage and functional decline driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Summarizes mitochondrial ROS and mtDNA mutation vicious cycle as driver of systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Mutation-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mtDNA copy number decline to mitochondrial dysfunction and vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitonuclear Interaction and Coevolution Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitonuclear coevolution and compensatory mutations maintaining mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitonuclear Interaction and Coevolution Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitonuclear match/mismatch affecting free radical leak, apoptosis, and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitonuclear Interaction and Coevolution Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores mitonuclear epistasis and sex-specific effects on mitochondrial bioenergetics and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitonuclear Interaction and Coevolution Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details mitochondrial superoxide dismutase interactions with ETC supercomplexes affecting ROS and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitonuclear Interaction and Coevolution Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on respiratory supercomplex stability regulated by RCF1 affecting mitochondrial function and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes mitochondrial respiratory chain activity, especially complex I, modulates aging and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes age-related decline in mitochondrial respiration and complex IV activity causing dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uncoupling-to-survive theory linking UCP-mediated mild uncoupling to reduced ROS and lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows mitochondrial uncoupling in insulin-producing cells attenuates insulin signaling and extends lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IPAM as mitochondrial metabolism modifier reducing electron leakage and ROS, extending lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Activity and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links endogenous mitochondrial ROS production rates inversely to longevity and caloric restriction effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Biogenesis and Signaling Pathway Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on PGC-1α signaling pathway regulating mitochondrial biogenesis and its decline causing dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Biogenesis and Signaling Pathway Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates mitochondrial function with GCN4-mediated integrated stress response in caloric restriction lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Biogenesis and Signaling Pathway Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial permeability transition pore regulation affecting autophagy and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Biogenesis and Signaling Pathway Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains mitochondrial fusion-fission dynamics controlling mutant mtDNA accumulation and quality control.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Biogenesis and Signaling Pathway Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mitochondrial-lysosomal axis theory linking impaired autophagy, lipofuscin accumulation, and oxidative stress.
